unnormalised: Crop insurance is vital for farmers in Maharashtra, facing monsoon uncertainties. Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY) can mitigate risks, but awareness is key. Timely payouts are crucial. Dr. Patil from ICAR suggested simpler claim processes. Average landholding is small, ~2 acres, so efficient coverage is needed. Rs. 20,000/acre loss can be devastating. Let's improve farmer enrollment, protecting their livelihoods and food security on every sq ft.
